htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual

Class LocalFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.AbstractFSObject
      • htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.LocalFSObject
        • htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.LocalFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    File, FSObject

    public class LocalFile
extends LocalFSObject
implements File
    A LocalFile represents a File in the local filesystem, which is a leaf in a LocalFolder. Created by felix on 03.06.15.
